recipe.title: Caribbean Coconut Curry Sauce
ingredients: 2/3 cup canned cream of coconut (such as Coco Lopez)
instructions: Whisk cream of coconut and fresh lime juice in small bowl until smooth. Stir in green onions, curry powder, cayenne pepper and salt. (Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
Brush half of sauce over chicken or seafood before and during grilling. Pass remaining sauce separately.
